author:
Khaled Hosseini
A Thousand Splendid Suns

quote: “Is man merely a mistake of God's? Or God merely a mistake of man?”
author:
Friedrich Nietzsche 
Notes

quote: “In order to be irreplaceacle, one must always be different.”
author:
Coco Chanel 
Notes

quote: “Even when you have doubts, take that step. Take chances. Mistakes are never a failure—they can be turned into wisdom.”
author:
Cat Cora 
Notes

quote: “I am free and that is why I am lost.”
author:
Franz Kafka 
Notes

quote: “Child, child, do you not see? For each of us comes a time when we must be more than what we are.”
author:
Lloyd Alexander
The Black Cauldron

quote: “I know all those words, but that sentence makes no sense to me.”
author:
Matt Groening 
Notes

quote: “The truth is what I make it. I could set this world on fire and call it rain.”
author:
Victoria Aveyard
Red Queen

quote: “The only calibration that counts is how much heart people invest, how much they ignore their fears of being hurt or caught out or humiliated. And the only thing people regret is that they didn't live boldly enough, that they didn't invest enough heart, didn't love enough. Nothing else really counts at all.”
author:
Ted Hughes
Letters of Ted Hughes

quote: “He cleared his throat and held up one hand dramatically.“Green grass breaks through snow.	Artemis pleads for my help.	I am so cool.”
author:
He grinned at us
waiting for applause.	"That last line was four syllables.

quote: “And hand in hand, on the edge of the sand, They danced by the light of the moon.”
author:
Edward Lear
The Owl and the Pussycat

quote: “That was one of the virtues of being a pessimist: nothing was ever as bad as you thought it would be.”
author:
James Jones
From Here to Eternity
